nodes.bodyText: Should we make an generic error component that is reusable across all react components for error messaging?

nodes.bodyText: +1 to this – this PR caught my eye, as I was running into some scenarios elsewhere in the Workbench UI where we don't have a clear / consistent way of displaying errors. A core component here would be great.

nodes.bodyText: Agreed, we're already using this same template in cohort builder, cohort review and now concept search (maybe other places as well?).  I've filed a ticket for this and can follow-up on it.
